rules.ruleString: Must be enrolled in course version {0028}

time: MBA Teaching Period 4 2017 (On-campus block of classes)

description: The unit exposes students to the 'economics lens' for reasoning in business. Topics to be considered include demand, supply and market analysis, cost concepts, price determination and pricing practices. The course aims to develop an understanding of the competitive environment facing firms through analysis of varying market structures (oligopoly, monopolistic competition etc).
